comments.body:
> clear() just removes the current elements in the map, but doesn't change or delete snapshots.

Hmm, could we document that? Also, do we have a use case for that? Once we clear the top tier, the snapshot may no longer be complete. So, not sure how useful it is.
Nothing we do to the current state changes the snapshot state.  Only deleting a snapshot can change snapshot state (by expunging it completely)  Snapshots are not mutable.
